'''Buildix''' is a [[computer]] [[operating system]] which can be used as a [[Live CD]]. It is an [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] based [[Linux distribution]], developed by Global IT professional services firm, [[ThoughtWorks]].
+
'''Buildix''' is a [[computer]] [[operating system]] which can be used as a [[Live CD]]. It is an [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] based [[Linux distribution]], developed by Global IT professional services firm, [[ThoughtWorks]].
Buildix is aimed at helping [[Agile software development|agile]] developers to get their projects up and running quickly and easily. The bundled software includes the key ingredients for an [[agile software development]] project including: [[CruiseControl]] (a [[continuous integration]] server), [[Subversion (software)|Subversion]] (a [[revision control]] system), [[Trac]] (a project-management tool) and [[Mingle]] (a commercial tool that aids agile management (free for 5 users)).
Buildix is aimed at helping [[Agile software development|agile]] developers to get their projects up and running quickly and easily. The bundled software includes the key ingredients for an [[agile software development]] project including: [[CruiseControl]] (a [[continuous integration]] server), [[Subversion (software)|Subversion]] (a [[revision control]] system), [[Trac]] (a project-management tool) and [[Mingle]] (a commercial tool that aids agile management (free for 5 users)).
